ranked_diseases.disease_name: Polydactyly, postaxial, types A1 and B
ranked_diseases.explanation: The patient presents with postaxial hand and foot polydactyly, which are hallmark features of this condition. The similar reference cases also align closely with this diagnosis.
This syndrome can present with polydactyly and intellectual disability, though other features like facial dysmorphism and growth delay are not noted in this patient.
This condition includes polydactyly and intellectual disability, but typically also involves retinal dystrophy and obesity, which are not mentioned here.
Meckel syndrome can present with polydactyly and intellectual disability, but it usually includes more severe features like encephalocele and cystic kidneys, which are absent here.
